name: Elementary Algebra
description: A course that covers the basics of algebra, including linear equations, polynomials, and basic operations.

name: Intermediate Algebra
description: A course that covers more advanced topics in algebra, such as rational equations, quadratic equations, and exponential equations.

name: Precalculus
description: A course that covers more advanced topics in algebra, such as trigonometry, logarithms, and conic sections.

name: Calculus I
description: A course that covers the basics of calculus, including limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: Calculus II
description: A course that covers more advanced topics in calculus, such as vectors, series, and Taylor polynomials.

name: Multivariable Calculus
description: A course that covers multivariable calculus, including vector-valued functions, partial derivatives, and multiple integrals.

name: Linear Algebra
description: A course that covers linear algebra, including systems of linear equations, matrices, and vector spaces.

name: Analysis I
description: A course that covers the basics of real analysis, including sequences and series, continuity, and derivatives.

name: Analysis II
description: A course that covers more advanced topics in real analysis, such as Riemann integration, metric spaces, and Fourier series.
